abstract: Microsoft is expected to announce a new Internet T. system that works on televisions and computers at the Digital Life Conference today.
snippet: Microsoft is expected to announce a new Internet T. system that works on televisions and computers at the Digital Life Conference today.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft is expected to announce a new Internet TV system that works on televisions and computers at the Digital Life Conference today. The system will include more than 100 hours of content from programs like Fox Sports and MSNBC that are also shown on MSN.
